post.summary:
Returns a detailed customer which has never been exported.
The customer will be marked as "Assigned to be exported"; the caller is supposed
to perform the export, and then notify back the API by updating the status of
the CustomerExport invoking [PUT] api/v1/customer-exports

404.description: No customer needs to be exported

put.summary: Concludes a customer export flow, by passing "completed" or "failed" as customer status.

parameters.description: Payload with the new customer export status

Note: to update the barcodes of an existing menu you have to use the api/v1/menus/{id}/barcodes endpoint.
Note: to update the menu swaps of an existing menu you have to use the api/v1/menus/{id}/menu-swaps endpoint.

post.summary:
Creates a new article price or price modification depending of the validation period.
If ValidFrom is in the past and there is not ValidTo specified, a price will be created.
Otherwise a price modification will be created.
If case no UOM unit is specified and the corresponding article uses an UOM group,
the default UOM unit is used. The default UOM is either the UOM unit with the modifier IsDefault=true
or the first created UOM unit of the group.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The article id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The price or price modification to be created.

400.description: The body request is malformed or empty

406.description: The body contains a model that is not valid

409.description: You are trying to create a resource that already exists

post.summary:
This endpoint let edit a list of prices/price modifications at once.
For every item in the list:

- if the item does not exist, it is created

delete.summary:
Deletes an existing article price modification OR a price.
If "from" date is prior to today and "to" date is null then the price is deleted.
If case no UOM unit is specified and the corresponding article uses an UOM group,
the default UOM unit is used. The default UOM is either the UOM unit with the modifier IsDefault=true
or the first created UOM unit of the group.
If you want to specify a UOM, you have to specify either the description and the factor.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the article you want to delete

parameters.name: priceLevelId
parameters.description: Price Level identifier

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Start date of modification

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Due date of price

parameters.name: factor
parameters.description: Factor of the UOM unit. This parameter is optional

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the UOM unit. This parameter is optional

put.summary:
Updates an existing promotion.
To update promotion's barcodes use api/v1/promotions/{id}/barcodes
To update promotion's pricelevels use api/v1/promotions/{id}/pricelevels
To update promotion's pricelevel groups use api/v1/promotions/{id}/pricelevel-groups
To update promotion's exclusions use api/v1/promotions/{id}/exclusions
To update promotion's validities use api/v1/promotions/{id}/validities
To update promotion's shop validities use the api/v1/promotions/{id}/shop-validities
To update promotion's cost centers use api/v1/promotions/{id}/cost-centers
To update promotion's companies use api/v1/promotions/{id}/companies
To update promotion's concept stores use api/v1/promotions/{id}/concept-stores (available from version 7.1)
To update promotion's subsidies use api/v1/promotions/{id}/subsidies
To update promotion's item groups use api/v1/promotions/{id}/item-groups

post.summary:
Returns a detailed transaction which has never been exported.
The Transaction will be marked as "Assigned to be exported"; the caller is supposed
to perform the export, and then notify back the API by updating the status of
the TransactionExport invoking [PUT] api/v1/transaction-exports

201.description: A withdrawal transaction not yet exported exists and the response body contains it

404.description: No withdrawal transaction needs to be exported

put.summary: Concludes a transaction export flow, by passing "completed" or "failed" as transaction status.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload with the new TransactionExport status

204.description: The withdrawal transaction has been registered as successfully exported

400.description: The body request is malformed or empty

get.summary: Returns the specified withdrawal / deposit transaction, if exists.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the transaction

200.description: The request was successful and the response body contains the found entity

KumoAPI.Articles.Article.description: This class contains the article data. It maps the articles database table.

Id.description: Article Identifier.

Barcodes.description: Contains all the barcodes available for the article

UomUnitPrices.description: List of default Prices per Units and Price Levels

Containers.description: List of Containers related to the Article

PopupLayers.description: List of popup layers that must be opened when the article is sold

PopupLayerOverrides.description: List of popup layer overides per shops that must be opened when the article is sold

ProductionCenters.description: List of the production centers related to this article

ProductionCenterOverrides.description: List of production center overrides at article and shop level

VatOverrides.description: List of vat overrides related to the article.

PriceApprovals.description: List of price approvals related to the article.

Description.description:
Article description (40 characters long).
Can be translated via Translation entries.

ShortDescription.description:
Short description of the article.
If missing on DB, the first 20 characters of the description are returned.
Can be translated via Translation entries.

Notes1.description:
Notes 1 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

Notes2.description:
Notes 2 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

Notes3.description:
Notes 3 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The visibility criteria of this article

IsValid.description: Article validity flag, always true.

ValidFrom.description: First day (included) of the article validity

ValidTo.description: Last day (included) of the article validity

Tare.description: When article unit of measure is weight, the standard tare of the article.

BarcodeTare.description:
When true, the tare of the article is not taken by the database field but from a barcode
under the dish which is read when the article is put on the scale.

PrintCoupon.description: When true, print a voucher for this article. Used in ticketing solutions.

Vat1Id.description: The Id of the first article VAT

Vat2Id.description: The Id of the second article VAT

Vat3Id.description: The Id of the third article VAT

Vat4Id.description: The Id of the fourth article VAT

UOMGroupId.description: The unit of measure the article belongs.

ReferencePrice.description: The reference price of the article.

ReferenceFormula.description:
The formula used to calculate the reference price.
If '%' the ReferencePrice is calculated as a percent value of the sales price.

ExcludeFromPromotions.description: If False the Article is subject to promotions otherwise no

ExcludedFromService.description: If False the Article is subject to promotions otherwise no

NotReturnable.description: Specify if the article can or not be returned during a partial storno

NotFood.description: Article amount cannot be used when calculating the amount that can be paid with vouchers.

LunchValue.description: The lunch value of the article used for subsidy allowed range.

PrintoutNotes.description:
Long note field for recipes and other infos.
Can be translated via Translation entries.

PromptPrice.description: Ask the article price when article is sold. The default price is the current price.

NoPriceChange.description:
When true, the price of this article cannot be changed even if the user
has the proper permission

ApprovePriceChange.description: When true, the shop is subject to the price change approval management

CourseOrder.description: When defined, this is the identifier of the default course assigned to an article;

LinkUomToOwner.description:
When changing the owner article UOM, this addition article also changes their UOM
The field is not used on sale articles

ShowImageInArticleKeys.description: If true, the image associated to the article is shown in all the articles keys

HideDescriptionInABCArea.description: If true, hides the description when the article is associated to a key in an ABC area

EnableBarcodePriceQty.description: Indicates if the barcode (with its price) of the article could have a quantity.

CanSwap.description: Shows if the article could be swapped with another article.

Translations.description: List of all Translations available for this entity.

Id.description: Article Causal Identifier.

InVatReport.description:
When true, the article linked to this causal will be included into the VAT reports,
otherwise it will be excluded

SendToProductionCenters.description: When true, the article linked to this causal will be sent to the production center, otherwise not

PrintCoupon.description: When true, for the article linked to this causal will be printed a coupon, otherwise not

Translations.description: List of all Translations available for this entity.

PrintCoupon.description: When true, for the article linked to this causal will be printed a coupon, otherwise not

The level of the closing.
1 - Primary closing
2 - Secondary closing

OpeningDate.description: Date and time when the shift was started

BookkeepingDate.description: The bookkeeping date of the shift. This field is used only when Type is ByTill24Hours

ClosingDate.description: The date and time of the shift close

OperatorId.description: The operator that does the closing. Used when Type is ByOperator or ByTillOperator

TillId.description: The till where the shift was opened. Used by all closings except ByOperator

ShopId.description: The shop where the shift was opened

DrawerUsed.description: The drawer used by the operator when working in ByTillOperator mode and two drawers are present

ForcedClose.description: True if the closing was forced

FiscalBillsPrinted.description: The number of fiscal bill printed

FiscalTurnoverAmount.description: The total turnover of fiscal bills

FiscalNonCollectedAmount.description: The sum of  non back payments

FiscalJournalLinesAvailable.description: The number of lines available in the current electronic journal flash memory

FiscalJournalClosingsAvailable.description: The estimated number of closings available in the current electronic journal flash memory

FiscalPrinterSerialNum.description: The serial number of the fiscal printer that made the daily closing

FiscalReturnAmount.description: The sum of non returned amount

GrandNumTransactions.description:
The cumulated number of transactions obtained adding the number of transactions of this closing to the previous one.
It is generated with primary closings by till/24H

GrandTurnoverAmount.description: The cumulated turnover. It is generated with primary closings by till/24H

GrandRefundsAmount.description: The cumulated refunds (article with price less than 0) amount. It is generated with primary closings by till/24H

IsFakeClosingDate.description:
For closings of type 3:Operator(shop)
true: means that closing date has been set automatically by tills, but the shift is actually open
false: means that closing date has been set by operator closing action, and the shift is closed, indeed

LastActivity.description: The last verified interaction made by operator on this shift.

MenuId.description: Id of the menu this custom attribute value is assigned to

DefinitionId.description: Id of corresponding custom attribute definition.

Value.description:
The value, that is assigned to the custom attribute for the specific article. Depending on the corresponding custom attribute type, the following types are supported:
0 - String: string, e.g. "some text"
1 - Integer: int number, e.g. "10"
2 - Currency: float number, e.g. "4.95"
3 - Boolean: boolean, e.g. "true"
4 - Date: ISO 8601 date, e.g. "2019-05-15"
5 - Datetime: ISO 8601 datetime, e.g. "2019-12-24T12:30:45"
6 - Float: float number, e.g. "101.0045"
7 - List: array of string values, e.g. "[\"Item1\", \"Item2\"]" or "['Item1', 'Item2']" Can be translated via Translation entries. (String values only)

CustomerId.description: The id of the corresponding customer.

Status.description:
The status of the customer:
- to be exported
- assigned
- failed
- completed

ValidFrom.description: Start date of validity of the card

ValidTo.description: Last date of validity of the card

PrepayBalanceCash.description:
The Cash purse of the prepayment balance.
This is incremented by the cash and credit card prepayments
and is the first one to be used when paying

PrepayBalanceVoucher.description:
The Voucher purse of the prepayment balance
This is incremented by the voucher prepayments
and used after the Cash purse is used

PrepayBalanceBonus.description:
The Bonus purse of the prepayment balance.
This is incremented by the prepayment revaluations
and used after the Cash and Voucher purses are used

CreditBalance.description: The credit balance of the card

Subsidies.description: List of subsidies for the customer

Id.description: Customer id. One on Id or CardNumber must be specified.

CardNumber.description: The Customer card number. One on Id or CardNumber must be specified.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The id of the visibility of the Customer

IsValid.description: Article validity flag, default is true

ValidFrom.description: First day (included) of the customer validity

ValidTo.description: Last day (included) of the customer validity

PrepayPaymentId.description: The payment id for prepayment and identification cards

PrepayPriceLevelId.description: The pricelevel id for prepayment and identification cards

PrepayLimitHigh.description: The maximum balance that a prepayment card can reach after a prepayment

PrepayLimitLow.description:
The minimum balance that can be reached when the card is in prepayment mode.
If the balance is on card, this value is ignored and assigned to 0

PrepayBalanceWarning.description: The balance amount used to warning the customer that he has reached a critical balance on his card

CreditPaymentId.description: The payment to use in the transaction when the customer is in credit mode

CreditPriceLevelId.description: The pricelevel to assign to the transaction when the customer is in credit mode

CreditLimit.description: The maximum balance reachable in credit mode

IdentificationPriceLevelId.description: The pricelevel id for prepayment and identification cards

CostCenterId.description: The ID of the cost center the customer belongs to

CompanyId.description: The ID of the company the customer belongs to

MacroId.description: The ID of the macro that has to be executed when a customer is assigned to the transaction

NoManualInput.description: Customer can be inserted only using a card

BalanceOnCard.description:
The balance of this card is on the card, so manual input
is not allowed when the card is in prepayment mode

Language.description:
The customer language code
The default value is the system language

Title.description: Customer Title used in the address

FiscalVatNumber.description: Vat number of the customer (11 digits for Italy)

ABCGroupId.description: ID (code) of the abc group that is assigned to the customer

DiscountValues.description: List of DiscountValues related to the Discount

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The id of the visibility of the discount

GroupAId.description: The article group on which the discount is applied

AbcGroupId.description: The ABC group where the discount will be available

IsValid.description: If true, the discount is valid and can be used

ApplyAfterPromotions.description: If the discount have to be applied before or after the promotions are applied to articles

NonPromotedItemsOnly.description:
This flag is checked only if the flag ApplyAfterPromotions is set to true and will force the discount to be applied
only on articles which are not subject to a promotion of any kind

UseLastThreshold.description: Use only last threshold when calculating discount

IsVariable.description: Discount is variable and maximum discount value is in the discount itself

UseGrossAmount.description:
Use the gross amount of articles instead of the already discounted ones when
calculating the amount the discount is calculated from

StopPromotions.description: When true, the articles that are subject this discount are not promotable

KumoAPI.DrawerCounts.DrawerCountCurrency.description: Represents a drawer count currency item

CountIdent.description: ID used for the Note Amount

CountType.description:
The payment type counted in this item
1 - NotesCoins
3 - CreditCards
4 - Vouchers
5 - Cheques
8 - Currencies

CurrencyId.description: The id of the currency this detail refers to. It is defined when count_type=8

CurrencyDescription.description: The description of the currency this detail refers to. It is defined when count_type=8

VoucherId.description: The id of the voucher this detail refers to. It is defined when count_type=4

VoucherDescription.description: The description of the voucher this detail refers to. It is defined when count_type=4

CreditCardId.description: The id of the credit card this detail refers to. It is defined when count_type=3

CreditCardDescription.description: The description of the credit card this detail refers to. It is defined when count_type=3

CountIdent.description: The payment ID used for the Note/coins Amount and Cheques

Value.description:
The value entered in the count
When foreign currencies are used, this is the average exchange rate adopted for the currency in the transactions of the shift

Quantity.description:
The quantity entered in the count
When foreign currencies are used, this is the amount in foreign currency

CurrencyDifference.description: The difference in foreign currency amount. Defined for final count when when currency_id is not null

CurrencyItems.description: The list of the details about foreign currencies if count_type=8

ShowFreeTableBorders.description: If true free-table borders are displayed

FillOccupiedTable.description: If true occupied tables are filled

OccupiedTableColor.description: Color for occupied tables (where the waiter can work)

OtherTableColor.description: Color for tables where the waiter cannot work

LockedTableColor.description: Color for tables locked from a reservation

NotServedColor.description: Color for tables waiting to be served for more than not_served_timeout

NotServedTimeout.description: Timeout for changing the table colour to not served

ConfirmTableClosing.description: If true, the table closing has to be manually confirmed for the table to be freed

ShowMonitorMessages.description: If true, preparation status change messages from kitchen monitors are displayed on screen

CleanEmptyTablesHour.description: If set, it is the time in which the tables, containing only one reservation and no sales item, are deleted every day

CleanEmptyTables.description:
When the parameter is true (default), the tables are deleted if suspended without valid items.
When the parameter is false, if the tables are suspended without valid items, a table reservation is generated and associated to the transaction.

Id.description: The Measure Unit identifier

IsStandard.description: When true, this unit of measurement is a standard unit that can't be modified or deleted.

Description.description:
General description of the measure unit.
Can be translated via Translation entries.

ShortDescription.description:
Short description of the measure unit.
Can be translated via Translation entries.

IsValid.description: When True, measure unit is valid and can be associated to an article.

InputDescription.description:
Description of the input unit measure.
Can be translated via Translation entries.

UseDecimalSeparator.description: When True, the decimal separator defined on the system parameters is used.

InputFactor.description:
Factor used to convert the input measure unit. Value should have at least 3 decimal places. If more places are specified,
the value will be rounded to 3 decimal places.

MaxValue.description: Maximum value for the input measure unit value

NumberOfDecimals.description: The number of decimals when using the measure unit.

Menu description (40 characters long).
Can be translated via Translation entries.

PrintDetails.description: When true, the articles that are part of the menu are printed in the customer receipt

IsValid.description: Menu validity flag, always true.

PriceLevelId.description:
If this field is defined, the article prices are not calculated
using the transaction pricelevel but the menu pricelevel.

IncludedInPromotions.description: If the menu is included or not in the promotion articles

NoService.description: When true, menu is not subject to service.

NotReturnable.description: Flag indicating if menu can be returned

AutoMenuGeneration.description: When true, this menu is generated automatically using the articles present in the transaction

MenuGenerationOrder.description:
This value determines the generation order of the menu in respect to the promotion.
It has the same effect like the Activation Order field in the Promotions definition page.

ValidFrom.description: Valid from date

ValidTo.description: Valid to date

LunchValue.description: >The weight of a menu in a subsidy.

VatId.description: The vat used to override the articles VAT

ShowImageInKeys.description: If true, the image is shown in all the keys

HideDescriptionInABCArea.description: If true, hides the menus's description on the buttons inside an abc area

CanSwap.description: When true, it is allowed to define this menu as swap menu, otherwise not

PromptPrice.description: When true, it prompt the menu price to the operator for a confirm

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The id of the visibility of the operator

HasArticleListOnLeft.description: Allows to move the vertical scroll bar on the left side of the form displayed by some function keys.

Language.description: Personal setting of the language used in Admin and Frontend, takes priority over the default language.

ArticleVisibilityCriteriaId.description: Id of the visibility criteria of the article. Both with ArticleId uniquely identifies the article

KumoAPI.ProductionCenters.ArticleProduct.description:
Defines the production center overrides at article and shop level.
This is used to override the production center of an article in a specific shop.

ArticleId.description: Id of the article for which the override is defined

ShopId.description: Id of the shop for which the override is defined

FromProductionCenterId.description: Id of the original production center

ArticleId.description: Id of the article for which the override is defined

ShopId.description: Id of the shop for which the override is defined

FromProductionCenterId.description: Id of the original production center

ArticleId.description: The Id of the article

ArticleVisibilityCriteriaId.description: Id of the visibility criteria of the article. Both with ArticleId uniquely identifies the article

ProductionCenterId.description: Ths Id of the production center

KumoAPI.ProductionCenters.HallProduction.description: Defines the override of production center at hall level.

HallId.description: Id of the hall where redirection is defined

FromProductionCenterId.description: Id of the original production center

HallId.description: Id of the hall where redirection is defined

KumoAPI.ProductionCenters.MonitorProduct.description: defines which production centers should display information on the monitor and which not

TillId.description: Id of the till

ShopId.description: Id of the shop (needed to identify the till)

Included.description: True if the association is enabled

Id.description: Production Center Identifier.

NotifierCenters.description: List of other production centers that send notifies to this one

NotifiedCenters.description: List of other production centers that receive notifies from this one

Articles.description: List of articles associated to this production center

MonitorProductionCenters.description: Enabling of the production center for monitors

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The visibility criteria of this production center

Printer1Id.description:
The main printer of the production center. If not specified, nothing is printed.
If any failure occurs during printout, printer2 will be used if specified.

PrintoutTemplate1Id.description: The template to be used with the printer1

Printer2Id.description: The backup printer of the production center. It will be used if the printer1 is not working

PrintoutTemplate2Id.description: The template to be used with the printer2

DrinkDispenserId.description: When defined, this field specified the drink dispenser where all articles just typed must be sent in "credit mode"

RemoveDoublePrintouts.description: When true, articles with immediate printouts are not printed twice but only in the curse call ticket

PrintOnlyNotifies.description:
When true the production center will print orders made only by notifications.
When false is necessary to have at least an article in order to print the notifications too

JoinComments.description: When true the production center will join comments regardless of the value of the parameter print_joined.

MaxOrderNumber.description:
When not null, this field enables the production center order number handling.
When this is active, a order number is assigned to every job sent to the production center.
The job number is contained in last_order_num, that must be incremented before the use.
If last_order_num is bigger than max_order_num, last_order_num is reset to zero

LastOrderNumber.description: Last order number used. See MaxOrderNumber for details

KumoAPI.ProductionCenters.ProductionCent.description:
Defines the override of production center at till level.
In case of redirection, nothing of the original production center is
used and the redirected one is used.
If the redirected production center is not defined, the program
will behave like no production center is attached to the article.

TillId.description: Id of the till where redirection is defined

FromProductionCenterId.description: Id of the original production center

TillId.description: Id of the till where redirection is defined

FromProductionCenterId.description: Id of the original production center

Id.description: Promotion Identifier (code)

Barcodes.description: List of barcodes of this promotion

PriceLevels.description: List of pricelevels pricelevels allowed for this promotion

PriceLevelGroups.description: List of pricelevel groups allowed for this promotion

Exclusions.description: List of promotions excluded by this promotion

Validities.description: List of validity periods of this promotion

ShopValidities.description: List of shop validities of this promotion

CostCenters.description: List of cost centers associated to this promotion

Companies.description: List of companies associated to this promotion

Subsidies.description: List of subsidies associated to this promotion

ItemGroups.description: List of item groups of this promotion

Actions.description: List of actions of this promotions

SimpleActions.description: List of simple actions of this promotions

ConceptStores.description: List of concept stores associated to this promotions

Description.description:
Promotion description (40 characters long).
Can be translated via Translation entries.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The visibility criteria of this article

Notes1.description:
Notes 1 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

Notes2.description:
Notes 2 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

Notes3.description:
Notes 3 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

PrintoutNotes.description:
Printout field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

IsValid.description: Promotion validity flag.

ActivationOrder.description:
The order of activation of the promotion. Promotions with lower order are activated before promotions with higher order.
If two promotions have the same activation order, then the system chooses the order that generates the higher discount

ValidFrom.description: The starting date of validity for the promotion

ValidTo.description: The ending date of validity for the promotion

ApplyToCheaperArticles.description: If the flag is not set, the most expensive are chosen, if is set the cheapest are.

ApplyToPromotedArticles.description: True if the promoted articles are considered.

ApplyToDiscountedArticles.description: True if the discounted articles are considered.

ApplyToGenericCustomers.description: True if the promotion is always activated, even if no customer is associated to the transaction

ApplyToRegisteredCustomers.description:
True if the promotion is activated when the transaction is associated
to a customer defined into the customers database

ApplyToSubsidizedCustomers.description: True if the promotion is activated when the transaction is associated to a customer having a subsidy set.

ApplyToMarkedArticles.description: True if the promotion is activated to marked articles

SuggestedSaleRemainingArticles.description:
If enabled, FrontEnd will warn during the sale the operator who is
selling the articles on the till, on which articles are missing so
that the promotion will be triggered.

FromGuests.description: The minimum table guest number to activate the promotion

ToGuests.description: The maximum table guest number to activate the promotion

MaxPromotionsPerMarker.description: The maximum promotions number per marker

MaxPromotionsPerTransaction.description: The maximum promotions number per transaction

MaxPromotionAmount.description: The maximum promotion amount per transaction

MinArticlesAmount.description:
If a value is specified in this field, the minimum amount of the promoted
articles necessary to activate the promotion

MinTransactionAmount.description:
If a value is specified in this field, the minimum gross total amount of
the transaction necessary to activate the promotion

UseSimpleActions.description: True if simple actions are used

CompaniesAreExcluded.description:
When true, the list of the companies are to be considered as companies not to be present in the transaction
for the promotion to activate

CostCentersAreExcluded.description:
When true, the list of the cost centers are to be considered as companies not to be present in the transaction
for the promotion to activate

SubsidiesAreExcluded.description:
When true, the list of the subsidies are to be considered as companies not to be present in the transaction
for the promotion to activate

GenerateVariableBarcode.description:
When the promotion is activated through a barcode, if this flag is true the barcode will be dynamically generated
so to have a blacklist of used barcodes

AcceptVariableBarcodeIfOffline.description: When true the variable promotion barcodes are accepted even if the cash register is offline, skipping the blacklist check if not online

VariableBarcodeFixedPart.description: When the variable barcode is in use, this is the fixed part

IncludeBarcodeExpiration.description:
If the variable barcode is being generated, setting this flag allow
the generation of a barcode which includes expiration

BarcodeExpirationDate.description: When the expiration is in use, if this field has a value this will be the expiration date

BarcodeExpirationDays.description:
As an alternative to the expiration date, this is the number of days from the barcode generation after which
the barcode is considered expired

DiscountInBarcode.description:
When the promotion is activated through a variable barcode, the discount amount is generated together
with the barcode by the printing promotion

BarcodeDiscountValue.description: Value of the discount/supplement for the barcode promotion

IncludeBarcodeStartValidity.description:
If the variable barcode is being generated, setting this flag allow the generation of a barcode
which includes start validity

BarcodeStartingDate.description: Start validity date barcode of promotion

BarcodeStartingDays.description: Start validity days barcode of promotion

ItemColor.description: The color for the promotion and the article discounted by the promotion

BarcodeDiscountThreshold.description: Value used as a divisor of the transaction total, to obtain the number of discounts to apply

BarcodeDiscountRepetition.description: Number of max repetitions of the discount on the current transaction; if null then there is no limit

BarcodeDiscountCutting.description: The cutoff of the total discount for the issue of one or more coupons, if null then there is no limit.

GroupId.description: Promotion Group Id

UseNetAmount.description:
True if the minumum total amount of transaction or minimum promotions items amount necessary
to activate the promotion will be calculated based on net amount.
The net amount is intended to be the amount of articles and menus after preceding manual discounts
and promotions are already applied.
Otherwise, it will be calculated based on gross amount

IsComposite.description:
True if it is a composed promotion.
A composed promotion works on article and his additions as a single object.

DisplayMessage.description: The message to display associated to the promotion

BarcodeDiscountRest.description: True if a value less than the threshold should be printed anyway, otherwise False.

QrUseWhiteList.description: True to use QR code with white list, otherwise False.

Translations.description: List of all Translations available for this entity.

PromotedAmount.description:
The amount promoted when the activation action is 1 - force
the amount for articles sold

FreeArticles.description: The number of free articles when requested from an activation action

DiscountId.description: The id of the discount when the promotion action involves the activation of a discount

ArticleId.description: The id of the article sold when the action requires

PromotionItemGroupId.description: The id of the promotion item group when involved from the action

ArticleCausalId.description: The id of the article causal when the action involves offering articles

VoucherPromotionId.description: The id of the voucher promotion when the action involves printing a voucher

PromotionText.description: >If the promotion action is to print a text, this is the formatted text which can be printed

Multiplier.description:
The multiplier (numerator) for the quantity needed to enable the promotion,
it will be divided by the quantity colum

Quantity.description: The item quantity needed to enable the promotion

Excluded.description: True if the item has to be excluded from the transaction to allow the promotion being enabled

ArticleId.description: The article id for the promotion item

MenuId.description: The menu associated to the promotion item

GroupLetter.description: Allows to specify a group letter if the item is defined as belonging to a group

GroupId.description: The promotion item is defined as belonging to the group having this id

PromoItemComplexFilterId.description: he id of the related promotion item complex filter if present

UseWeight.description: If true, the article weight will be considered instead of quantity

Id.description: Promotion Item Group Identifier (code)

Items.description: List of items belonging to this item group

NoItemMix.description:
When this flag is set to true, the items inside the promotion group cannot be mixed
so the quantities are considered only for the same item (article or menu)

FromQuantity.description: The minimum quantity of recurrences of the group allowed to enable the promotion

ToQuantity.description: The maximum quantity of recurrences of the group that can be promoted

MinGroupAmount.description:
If the group quantities are from 0 to 9999 (optional group), this optional amount will determine
the number of activations for the specified group based on the sum of the articles amount

that the promotion will be triggered.

FromGuests.description: The minimum table guest number to activate the promotion

ToGuests.description: The maximum table guest number to activate the promotion

MaxPromotionsPerMarker.description: The maximum promotions number per marker

MaxPromotionsPerTransaction.description: The maximum promotions number per transaction

MaxPromotionAmount.description: The maximum promotion amount per transaction

MinArticlesAmount.description:
If a value is specified in this field, the minimum amount of the promoted
articles necessary to activate the promotion

MinTransactionAmount.description:
If a value is specified in this field, the minimum gross total amount of
the transaction necessary to activate the promotion

UseSimpleActions.description: True if simple actions are used

CompaniesAreExcluded.description:
When true, the list of the companies are to be considered as companies not to be present in the transaction
for the promotion to activate

CostCentersAreExcluded.description:
When true, the list of the cost centers are to be considered as companies not to be present in the transaction
for the promotion to activate

SubsidiesAreExcluded.description:
When true, the list of the subsidies are to be considered as companies not to be present in the transaction
for the promotion to activate

GenerateVariableBarcode.description:
When the promotion is activated through a barcode, if this flag is true the barcode will be dynamically generated
so to have a blacklist of used barcodes

AcceptVariableBarcodeIfOffline.description: When true the variable promotion barcodes are accepted even if the cash register is offline, skipping the blacklist check if not online

VariableBarcodeFixedPart.description: When the variable barcode is in use, this is the fixed part

IncludeBarcodeExpiration.description:
If the variable barcode is being generated, setting this flag allow
the generation of a barcode which includes expiration

BarcodeExpirationDate.description: When the expiration is in use, if this field has a value this will be the expiration date

BarcodeExpirationDays.description:
As an alternative to the expiration date, this is the number of days from the barcode generation after which
the barcode is considered expired

DiscountInBarcode.description:
When the promotion is activated through a variable barcode, the discount amount is generated together
with the barcode by the printing promotion

BarcodeDiscountValue.description: Value of the discount/supplement for the barcode promotion

IncludeBarcodeStartValidity.description:
If the variable barcode is being generated, setting this flag allow the generation of a barcode
which includes start validity

BarcodeStartingDate.description: Start validity date barcode of promotion

BarcodeStartingDays.description: Start validity days barcode of promotion

ItemColor.description: The color for the promotion and the article discounted by the promotion

BarcodeDiscountThreshold.description: Value used as a divisor of the transaction total, to obtain the number of discounts to apply

BarcodeDiscountRepetition.description: Number of max repetitions of the discount on the current transaction; if null then there is no limit

BarcodeDiscountCutting.description: The cutoff of the total discount for the issue of one or more coupons, if null then there is no limit.

GroupId.description: Promotion Group Id

UseNetAmount.description:
True if the minumum total amount of transaction or minimum promotions items amount necessary
to activate the promotion will be calculated based on net amount.
The net amount is intended to be the amount of articles and menus after preceding manual discounts
and promotions are already applied.
Otherwise, it will be calculated based on gross amount

IsComposite.description:
True if it is a composed promotion.
A composed promotion works on article and his additions as a single object.

DisplayMessage.description: The message to display associated to the promotion

BarcodeDiscountRest.description: True if a value less than the threshold should be printed anyway, otherwise False.

QrUseWhiteList.description: True to use QR code with white list, otherwise False.

Translations.description: List of all Translations available for this entity.

DayOfWeek.description: The day of the week when the promotion is valid.

StartTime.description: The period start time, in minutes since midnight

EndTime.description: The period end time, in minutes since midnight

DayOfWeek.description: The day of the week when the promotion is valid.

StartTime.description: The period start time, in minutes since midnight

EndTime.description: The period end time, in minutes since midnight

KumoAPI.Promotions.PromotionSimpleAction.description:
This class defines the actions activated by a promotion when promo is in simple actions mode
In such mode, the actions have a single article as target and the action type is specified here
together with the article

ArticleId.description: The promotion is activated by this article. When null, the group_id is used

MenuId.description: The promotion is activated by this menu as alternative to the article, the group_id is not used for menus

GroupLetter.description: Allows to specify a group letter if the item is defined as belonging to a group

GroupId.description:
The promotion is activated by articles that belong to this group at the letter specified by group letter.
When NULL, the article_id is used

ActionAmount.description: The amount of the promotion when needed from the simple action selected

PromoItemComplexFilterId.description: The id of the related promotion item complex filter if present

ArticleId.description: The promotion is activated by this article. When null, the group_id is used

Can be translated via Translation entries.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The visibility criteria of this article

Notes1.description:

Notes2.description:
Notes 2 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

Notes3.description:
Notes 3 field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

PrintoutNotes.description:
Printout field
Can be translated via Translation entries.

IsValid.description: Promotion validity flag.

ActivationOrder.description:
The order of activation of the promotion. Promotions with lower order are activated before promotions with higher order.
If two promotions have the same activation order, then the system chooses the order that generates the higher discount

ValidFrom.description: The starting date of validity for the promotion

ValidTo.description: The ending date of validity for the promotion

ApplyToCheaperArticles.description: If the flag is not set, the most expensive are chosen, if is set the cheapest are.

ApplyToPromotedArticles.description: True if the promoted articles are considered.

ApplyToDiscountedArticles.description: True if the discounted articles are considered.

ApplyToGenericCustomers.description: True if the promotion is always activated, even if no customer is associated to the transaction

ApplyToRegisteredCustomers.description:
True if the promotion is activated when the transaction is associated
to a customer defined into the customers database

ApplyToSubsidizedCustomers.description: True if the promotion is activated when the transaction is associated to a customer having a subsidy set.

ApplyToMarkedArticles.description: True if the promotion is activated to marked articles

SuggestedSaleRemainingArticles.description:

selling the articles on the till, on which articles are missing so
that the promotion will be triggered.

PrinterPort.description:
The parameter of the communication port used by the printer.
It can be a printer queue (\\servername\printername), a local port (COM or LPT) or a printer name if the Windows printer is used.

AdditionalParameters.description: Additional INI parameters passed to the printer when it is created

QueuePollingDelay.description: The number of milliseconds between printer queue status checks

QueueTimeout.description: The number of seconds of printer inactivity before declaring the queue as blocked and the printer not responsive

JobDespoolInterval.description: The number of seconds between job transmission retries

JobDespoolTimeout.description: The timeout in seconds of job transmission retries. When the timeout is reached, the job is removed.

KumoAPI.ShopTypes.ShopShopType.description: Represents the association of a shop to a shop type

Id.description: This field is the primary key exposed and it represents the TCPOS code
This field is the primary key exposed and it represents the TCPOS code

ShopId.description: The shop where the conversion takes place.
The shop where the conversion takes place.
The shop where the conversion takes place.

DayOfWeek.description: The day of the week when the conversion is scheduled.

StartTime.description: The period start time, in minutes since midnight

EndTime.description: The period end time, in minutes since midnight

ShopId.description: The shop where the conversion takes place.

DayOfWeek.description: The day of the week when the conversion is scheduled.

StartTime.description: The period start time, in minutes since midnight

EndTime.description: The period end time, in minutes since midnight

Id.description: The shop Id.

SubsidyConversions.description: List of subsidy conversions defined for the shop

PriceLevelConversions.description: List of price level conversions defined for the shop

PermanentPriceLevelConversions.description: List of permanent price level conversions defined for the shop

PrepayArticleVatId.description:
The special vat that must be used for some prepayment article in some country
where normal rules does not apply.

PrepayVatCollArticleId.description:
The technical article used to perform the collection of VAT
on prepay (balance recharge) operations for precollected customer cards.

DrawerCountTemplateId.description: Id of the drawer count template used in this shop.

DrawerJournalTemplateId.description: Id of the drawer journal template used in this shop.

ApprovePriceChange.description: Defines if the change of price needs approval.

P2pProtocolType.description:
1 - send UDP broadcast to find P2P tills with IPV4
2 - use till P2P static IP addresses with IPV4
3 - use till P2P static IP addresses with IPV6

TcpConnectionTimeout.description: Maximum timeout accepted for opening a TCP connection, expressed in seconds.

MobileDevicesSendDb.description: If false, the handhelds set as Mobiledevice don't send the local DB to the others tills via P2P.

PartialLocaldbArtDays.description:
The number of days an active article is copied in the local database.
If article was never active or was active before, it is not copied.

PartialLocaldbCustDays.description:
The number of days an active customer is copied in the local database.
If customer was never active or was active before, it is not copied.

EndOfDayOffset.description:
Specifies when the shop closes.
It is a expressed in fraction of days (one hour is 1/24)
with positive numbers between 00:00 and 12:00
and negative numbers between 24:00 and 12:00.
Daily closing time 02:00 is 2/24, 22:00 is -2/24

Interval24HoursClosing.description:
When DailyClosingType = 24hours, this is the minimum number of minutes
that must pass after EndOfDayOffset before executing again a daily closing.

Alert24HoursClosing.description:
When daily_closing_type = 24hours, this is the number of minutes before
EndOfDayOffset that the system uses to give a warning to the till operator
that he should close the till.

AllowOfflineClosings.description:
0: Ask operator
1: Yes
2: No
[Since offline closings may cause troubles with operator/shop shifts, should be enabled only when not avoidable]

OperatorClosingsPeriod.description:
This is expected (maximum) period of operators shifts closings and drawer counts
0: Not applicable
1: Daily
2: Weekly (starting from Monday)
3: Monthly (from 1 to last day of month included)

PrepayCreditCardRevalId.description: Credit card prepayment revaluation discount id

IsOpen.description:
If true, the shop is open and operators can use the tills.
If false, it is not possible to login anymore.

DrawerCreditcardsDetails.description: If true, the function drawer count show the credit cards tab.

DrawerChequesDetails.description: If true, the function drawer count allows the manipulation of the cheques details.

DrawerCashMode.description:
Shop drawer cash count mode:
0 - Enter notes and coins
1 - Enter total cash amount
2 - Choose total or detailed cash amount

FinalDrawerCountMandatory.description: If true, the final drawer count is shown during the shift closing operation.

InitialDrawerCountMandatory.description: If true, the initial drawer count is shown during the login operation.

ServiceType.description:
The type of the service to be applied. Possible values are:
0 - No service applied
1 - Calculate on net amount (amount included in sale price)
2 - Calculate on gross amount (amount included in sale price)
3 - Fixed supplement subject to VAT
4 - Variable supplement VAT exempt, can be modified manually

DrawerCountRetries.description: The number of drawer count retries allowed.

MaxCashDifference.description: The maximum drawer count selling difference allowed.

CoverArticleId.description:
Id of the article to be used for automatic cover charge.
If null no charge will be added.

OperatorMultipleLogin.description:
Enable operators to log on different tills at the same time.
Default is false (disabled).

PrepayRechargeVatId.description:
The vat value used for the prepayment in some country
where normal rules does not apply.

PrepayArticleMode.description:
Defines the rules that must be applied for the article paid in prepayment mode
in some country where normal rules does not apply:
0 Article with VAT below or equal,
1 Article with VAT below or equal except special one

VoucherInvoiceVatId.description:
The special voucher vat Id, for Italy.
If this value is defined
it will be used instead of the one in the system parameters.

VatExemptionPriority.description:
The priority of the exemption to apply.Possible values are:
0 - Higher
1 - Lower
2 - Proportional

DrawerExcludeNoDrawer.description:
1: the total amount of NoDrawerNoTurnover articles would be detracted from total cash amount
0: no detractions

SiretNumber.description:
NF525:
This field defines the SIRET number for France (number of plant).

NafCode.description:
NF525:
This field defines the NAF number for France.

TvaNumber.description:
NF525:
This field defines the TVA number for France.

CashflowTime.description:
NF525:
Time at which calculate all cashflows.

CashflowWeeklyDay.description:
NF525:
Day of week in which weekly cashflows must be calculated:
0: Not available
1: Monday
2: Tuesday
3: Wednesday
4: Thursday
5: Friday
6: Saturday
7: Sunday

CashflowMonthlyDay.description:
NF525:
Day of month in which monthly cashflows must be calculated.
For months shorter than selected day, calculation will be anticipated to last day of month.

CashflowAnnualDay.description:
NF525:
Day of year in which exercise cashflows must be calculated, starting from 1 January.

CashflowEnabled.description:
NF525:
Is generation of automatic periodic cashflows enabled.

CashflowEnabledTime.description:
NF525:
The timestamp when the cashflows calculation has been enabled for the first time.

CashflowLastDate.description:
NF525:
The date of the last cashflows calculation for the shop-

PrintTransactionBarcode.description: If true, the trans-id-barcode is added to the XML for the prints.

DefaultVatId.description:
NF525:
The default vat used when the articles VAT is not specified.

EncryptLocalDb.description: If true, the local database of the cash registers will be encrypted.

LocalDbEncryptionKey.description:
They key used for encrypting the local database.
If empty, a default encryption key will be used.
This field is considered only if EncryptLocalDb is true.

CardAdvancedGeneration.description:
False: standard behavior applies.
True: force the customer card number in the format "TillID + DateTime.Now"

DenyModificationTemplate.description:
False: data copied from the template customer can be modified.
True: data copied from the template customer cannot be modified

EnableImagesReminders.description:
Show as reminder the allergens small images under the keys.
Overrides the parameter at the level of the system parameters.

DietaryDisableButtons.description:
If selected in presence of a customer into transaction the buttons
related to items to which the customer is allergic will be disabled.

VoucherBalanceVatId.description: Defines the vat used when the payments is made with a voucher balance of a prepaied card.

Translations.description: List of all Translations available for this entity.

PriceLevelConversions.description: List of price level conversions defined for the shop

Id.description: The shop Id.

ShopTypeIds.description: List of IDs of shop's types

ShopOwnerIds.description: List of ID's of shop's owners

SubsidyConversions.description: List of subsidy conversions defined for the shop

PriceLevelConversions.description: List of price level conversions defined for the shop

PriceLevelFallbacks.description: List of price level fallbacks defined for the shop

PermanentPriceLevelConversions.description: List of permanent price level conversions defined for the shop

PrepayArticleVatId.description:
The special vat that must be used for some prepayment article in some country
where normal rules does not apply.

PrepayVatCollArticleId.description:
The technical article used to perform the collection of VAT
on prepay (balance recharge) operations for precollected customer cards.

DrawerCountTemplateId.description: Id of the drawer count template used in this shop.

DrawerJournalTemplateId.description: Id of the drawer journal template used in this shop.

ApprovePriceChange.description: Defines if the change of price needs approval.

P2pProtocolType.description:
1 - send UDP broadcast to find P2P tills with IPV4
2 - use till P2P static IP addresses with IPV4
3 - use till P2P static IP addresses with IPV6

TcpConnectionTimeout.description: Maximum timeout accepted for opening a TCP connection, expressed in seconds.

MobileDevicesSendDb.description: If false, the handhelds set as Mobiledevice don't send the local DB to the others tills via P2P.

PartialLocaldbArtDays.description:
The number of days an active article is copied in the local database.
If article was never active or was active before, it is not copied.

PartialLocaldbCustDays.description:
The number of days an active customer is copied in the local database.
If customer was never active or was active before, it is not copied.

EndOfDayOffset.description:
Specifies when the shop closes.
It is a expressed in fraction of days (one hour is 1/24)
with positive numbers between 00:00 and 12:00
and negative numbers between 24:00 and 12:00.
Daily closing time 02:00 is 2/24, 22:00 is -2/24

Interval24HoursClosing.description:
When DailyClosingType = 24hours, this is the minimum number of minutes
that must pass after EndOfDayOffset before executing again a daily closing.

Alert24HoursClosing.description:
When daily_closing_type = 24hours, this is the number of minutes before
EndOfDayOffset that the system uses to give a warning to the till operator
that he should close the till.

AllowOfflineClosings.description:
0: Ask operator
1: Yes
2: No
[Since offline closings may cause troubles with operator/shop shifts, should be enabled only when not avoidable]

OperatorClosingsPeriod.description:
This is expected (maximum) period of operators shifts closings and drawer counts
0: Not applicable
1: Daily
2: Weekly (starting from Monday)
3: Monthly (from 1 to last day of month included)

PrepayCreditCardRevalId.description: Credit card prepayment revaluation discount id

IsOpen.description:
If true, the shop is open and operators can use the tills.
If false, it is not possible to login anymore.

DrawerCreditcardsDetails.description: If true, the function drawer count show the credit cards tab.

DrawerChequesDetails.description: If true, the function drawer count allows the manipulation of the cheques details.

DrawerCashMode.description:
Shop drawer cash count mode:
0 - Enter notes and coins
1 - Enter total cash amount
2 - Choose total or detailed cash amount

FinalDrawerCountMandatory.description: If true, the final drawer count is shown during the shift closing operation.

InitialDrawerCountMandatory.description: If true, the initial drawer count is shown during the login operation.

ServiceType.description:
The type of the service to be applied. Possible values are:
0 - No service applied
1 - Calculate on net amount (amount included in sale price)
2 - Calculate on gross amount (amount included in sale price)
3 - Fixed supplement subject to VAT
4 - Variable supplement VAT exempt, can be modified manually

DrawerCountRetries.description: The number of drawer count retries allowed.

MaxCashDifference.description: The maximum drawer count selling difference allowed.

CoverArticleId.description:
Id of the article to be used for automatic cover charge.
If null no charge will be added.

OperatorMultipleLogin.description:
Enable operators to log on different tills at the same time.
Default is false (disabled).

PrepayRechargeVatId.description:
The vat value used for the prepayment in some country
where normal rules does not apply.

PrepayArticleMode.description:
Defines the rules that must be applied for the article paid in prepayment mode
in some country where normal rules does not apply:
0 Article with VAT below or equal,
1 Article with VAT below or equal except special one

ShopId.description: Id (code) of shop where this conversion take place

DayOfWeek.description: Day(s) of application of subsidy conversion

ToSubsidyId.description: The ID of the subsidy to be used instead of the original one

ShopId.description: Id (code) of shop where this conversion take place

DayOfWeek.description: Day(s) of application of subsidy conversion

ToSubsidyId.description: The ID of the subsidy to be used instead of the original one

Priority.description:
The priority of application of the subsidy, respect all the others subsidies available
to the same customer. Lower numbers mean higher priority

The priority of application of the subsidy, respect all the others subsidies available
to the same customer. Lower numbers mean higher priority

Id.description: This field is the primary key exposed and it represents the TCPOS code

Description.description:
Subsidy description (40 characters long).
Can be translated via Translation entries.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The visibility criteria of this subsidy

IsValid.description:
Subsidy validity flag.
NOTE: IsValid cannot be set to false if SubsidyType = 'Seasonal'

BalanceArticleId.description:
The ID of the article to be used when it is necessary to balance the amount of
subsidized articles with the amount of the subsidy.
BalanceArticleId has to be specified if SubsidyType = Meal (that is default value).

FixedShareAmount.description: When !=0, this field contains the overridden price of the fixed share article

FixedShareArticleId.description:
When defined, this article is automatically sold and it is paid by the customer.
Its price can be overridden by FixedShareAmount when it is != 0
NOTE: only one of FixedShareArticleId and FixedSharePopupLayerId can be specified.

FixedSharePopupLayerId.description:
When defined, this popup layer is displayed and the user must choose a fixed share
article from it. Its price can be overridden by FixedShareAmount when it is != 0.
NOTE: only one of FixedShareArticleId and FixedSharePopupLayerId can be specified.

MealArticleId.description:
When defined, this article is automatically sold and is subsidized.
NOTE: only one of MealArticleId or MealArticlePopupLayerId can be specified.

MealArticlePopupLayerId.description:
When defined, this popup layer is displayed and the user must choose a meal
article from it.
NOTE: only one of MealArticleId or MealArticlePopupLayerId can be specified.

DiscountId.description: When defined, the discount to add automatically to the transaction.

SettleDiscountId.description: Subsidy can be settled by payment or discount - one or the other

PaymentId.description: Subsidy can be settled by payment or discount - one or the other

PriceLevelId.description: When defined, the ID of the pricelevel to be used in the transaction

VariableAmount.description: When true, the subsidy value can be modified by the operator when the card is read.

AllowManualDiscounts.description:
When true, manual discounts can use used when the subsidy is active.
When false, manual discount are not allowed (and are removed when adding the subsidy).

InvoiceVatId.description:
VAT id to be used in invoicing of the quotes of compensation that were unpaid
during the recording of the transactions to the customers who used this subsidy.

LaunchValueFrom.description:
This field is used to specify the minimum subsidized articles lunch value
that must be reached in order to activate a subsidy. Below this limit, the subsidy
is not activated.

LaunchValueTo.description:
This field is used to specify the maximum subsidized articles lunch value
that must not be exceeded. Over this limit, it is not possible to close the transaction
 with the current subsidized articles. In order to continue it is necessary to
de-subsidize articles until the limit is not exceeded.

NoWarningMessages.description: True if warning messages are disabled

Id.description: This field is the primary key exposed and it represents the TCPOS code

Description.description:
Subsidy description (40 characters long).
Can be translated via Translation entries.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The visibility criteria of this subsidy

IsValid.description:
Subsidy validity flag.
NOTE: IsValid cannot be set to false if SubsidyType = 'Seasonal'

BalanceArticleId.description:
The ID of the article to be used when it is necessary to balance the amount of
subsidized articles with the amount of the subsidy.
BalanceArticleId has to be specified if SubsidyType = Meal (that is default value).

FixedShareAmount.description: When !=0, this field contains the overridden price of the fixed share article

FixedShareArticleId.description:
When defined, this article is automatically sold and it is paid by the customer.
Its price can be overridden by FixedShareAmount when it is != 0
NOTE: only one of FixedShareArticleId and FixedSharePopupLayerId can be specified.

FixedSharePopupLayerId.description:
When defined, this popup layer is displayed and the user must choose a fixed share
article from it. Its price can be overridden by FixedShareAmount when it is != 0.
NOTE: only one of FixedShareArticleId and FixedSharePopupLayerId can be specified.

MealArticleId.description:
When defined, this article is automatically sold and is subsidized.
NOTE: only one of MealArticleId or MealArticlePopupLayerId can be specified.

MealArticlePopupLayerId.description:
When defined, this popup layer is displayed and the user must choose a meal
article from it.
NOTE: only one of MealArticleId or MealArticlePopupLayerId can be specified.

DiscountId.description: When defined, the discount to add automatically to the transaction.

SettleDiscountId.description: Subsidy can be settled by payment or discount - one or the other

PaymentId.description: Subsidy can be settled by payment or discount - one or the other

PriceLevelId.description: When defined, the ID of the pricelevel to be used in the transaction

VariableAmount.description: When true, the subsidy value can be modified by the operator when the card is read.

AllowManualDiscounts.description:
When true, manual discounts can use used when the subsidy is active.
When false, manual discount are not allowed (and are removed when adding the subsidy).

InvoiceVatId.description:
VAT id to be used in invoicing of the quotes of compensation that were unpaid
during the recording of the transactions to the customers who used this subsidy.

LaunchValueFrom.description:
This field is used to specify the minimum subsidized articles lunch value
that must be reached in order to activate a subsidy. Below this limit, the subsidy
is not activated.

LaunchValueTo.description:
This field is used to specify the maximum subsidized articles lunch value
that must not be exceeded. Over this limit, it is not possible to close the transaction
 with the current subsidized articles. In order to continue it is necessary to
de-subsidize articles until the limit is not exceeded.

Items.description: List of tax override items.

OverridePriority.description: The priority of the override. Lower numbers have an higher priority.

MinimumQuantity.description:
The minimum quantity that the articles specified in tax_override_items have to reach in order to trigger the tax override.
If empty, no check is made

MaxAmount.description:
The maximum amount allowed form the articles specified in tax_override_items can reach in order to trigger the tax override.
If empty, no check is made

CompanyId.description:
This override is made only when customers with the specified company are associated to the transaction.
If empty, no check is made

PricelevelId.description:
This override is made only to articles with the specified pricelevel.
If empty, no check is made

ToTaxVatId.description:
The tax applied if for the items subject to the application rules.
If empty, the original tax is removed and no other is applied.
