ShopId.description: The id of the shop the till belongs to

Enabled.description: When true, this till can be used.

BillHeader.description: The lines printed at the top of the bill.

BillFooter.description: The lines printed at the bottom of the bill.

DisplayCustomerClosed1.description: The message shown to the customer when the operator is logged out, first line.

DisplayCustomerClosed2.description: The message shown to the customer when the operator is logged out, second line.

DisplayCustomerSale1.description: The message shown to the customer after login, cancel and transaction total, first line.

DisplayCustomerSale2.description:
The message shown to the customer after login, cancel and transaction total, second line.
If after a total, this line is shown only after TotalTimeout seconds.

DisplayOperatorSale1.description: The message shown to the user after login, cancel and transaction total, first line.

DisplayOperatorSale2.description:
The message shown to the user after login, cancel and transaction total, second line.
If after a total, this line is shown only after TotalTimeout seconds

InactivityTimeout.description: Number of seconds of between database connection retries.

LogoutTimeout.description: Number of seconds of inactivity before an operator logout is forced

PauseTimeout.description: Number of seconds of inactivity before an operator pause is forced

TotalTimeout.description: Number of seconds before the Total message is hidden after a transaction is closed

MonitorWarnTimeout.description:
Field used by monitor tills: Timeout after which the article has to be displayed in
a different color

MaxLineAmount.description: The maximum allowed amount of a manually entered article price.

FastLogout.description: When true, a operator logout is automatically made after every transaction close or suspension.

NoDrawer.description:
Do not check the drawer status at the end of the transaction.
Just show a dialog box showing the change amount

SuspendOperator.description: When true, it is possible to suspend the current transaction on an operator.

DumpTransaction.description: When true, the transaction in progress is continuously stored in file in case of till crash.

DumpClosing.description: When true, the closing in progress is continuously stored in file in case of till crash.

ShowTablesForm.description: If true, the tables form has to be show each time

ForceTableUsage.description: If true, the tables selection is mandatory to close the transaction

AskGuestsNumber.description: The number of guest is asked to the user. 0 = Never, 1 = Always, 2 = On table selection

DefaultGuestsNumber.description: The default guest number for the transaction

DefaultLayer.description:
The default layer of this till.
If -1, the layer is linked to the day of week

DefaultLayerReturn.description:
When the till should show again the default layer:
0 - Never, only on startup
1 - After each login
2 - After each transaction

AmountValue1.description: Amount input keypad, first fixed amount button starting from bottom.

AmountValue2.description: Amount input keypad, second fixed amount button starting from bottom.

AmountValue3.description: Amount input keypad, third fixed amount button starting from bottom.

AmountValue4.description: Amount input keypad, fourth fixed amount button starting from bottom.

PrepayValue1.description:
Amount input keypad, first fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

PrepayValue2.description:
Amount input keypad, second fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

PrepayValue3.description:
Amount input keypad, third fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

PrepayValue4.description:
Amount input keypad, third fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

LocalDbArticles.description: When true, the article an price lookup is made locally even if online

LocalDbTransactions.description:
When true, transactions are not sent immediately to the server but stored locally
and sent asynchronously.

LocalDbCards.description: When true, the customer search is made locally even if online.

MaxDatabaseAge.description:
The age (espressed in minutes) a local DB can be in order to be considered "refreshed"
At till startup, if the age of the local DB is lower than the specified number of minutes, no snapshot download is performed.
When looking for a DB over the P2P, the DB is accepted if its age is lower than the specified number of minutes.

TillTemplateId.description:
Till keyboard template. When it is not null, the keys will be retrieved from
the template keys instead directly from the till keys table

JournalTemplateId.description: The template used for electronic journals

JobTemplateId.description: The template to print generic string lists

FiscalTemplateId.description: The template used for fiscal bills

InvoiceTemplateId.description: The template used for invoices printed with the slip printer

ReceiptTemplateId.description: The template used for receipts printed with the slip printer

MonitorTemplateId.description: Field used by monitor tills: Template to be used when printing preparation bills

PayAtTablePreprintTemplateId.description: The pre-print template used by the PayAtTable module

PayAtTableBillTemplateId.description: The receipt template used by the PayAtTable module

CardloaderClosingTemplateId.description: The receipt template used by the PayAtTable module

DefaultPricelevelId.description: The Id of the default pricelevel used in this till.

ProductionCenterCounterId.description: The production center order counter id

PrintoutMandatory.description: When true, a printer must be selected

PrintJoined.description: When 1 the articles with same code and properties are joined together when printed

ShowCourseOrder.description: When true, the course order is shown on the article list beside each line

CourseDisplayModeActive.description: When true, the course display mode is enabled

ShowArticlesNumber.description: When true, the number of articles is shown on the article list

ForcePricelevel.description:
When true, the till will always sell the articles with the default pricelevel
and the forced articles will not change pricelevel even if the function is used.
The transaction pricelevel is not modified.

SaveItemPricelevel.description:
When true, changing the pricelevel will not change the pricelevel of the items
already entered into the transaction

TextParameters.description:
This field contains parameters that have the same syntax of the INI file.
It is parsed in the same way as the INI file after data is loaded.

CardloaderWithdrawalId.description: The withdrawal item to use when a withdrawal operation is performed on the card loader

EftPresent.description: True when a EFT display is present

TicketManagerPresent.description: True when a ticket manager device is present

FingerprintPresent.description: True when a fingerprinter device is present

MonitorHideEmpty.description: Field used by monitor tills: Hide the bills with no article to be prepared

MonitorShowOnHold.description: Field used by monitor tills: Show the articles not yet called

MonitorDivideArticles.description:
Field used by monitor tills: When true, in article visualisation mode, the
articles with different modifiers(comments, additions) are separated

MonitorShowCourses.description: Field used by monitor tills: Show current courses

VendingVatId.description: The id of the VAT to be used for vending machines tills

MacAddress.description:
The mac address of the physical cash register connected to this record.
It is used by the cash register setup procedure

MultipleItemQuantityMode.description:
When true, selling an article with quantity bigger than 1
will in fact sell multiple items instead of change the quantity of the item

InvFiscDataMandatory.description: When true customer fiscal informations are mandatory for invoice printing (Only for IT).

ShowSeatNumbers.description: Enable or disable showing the seat number on transaction items

FiscalRegisterId.description: This field contains the fiscal register id defined by the fiscal authorities

P2PIpAddress.description:
The (optional) static IP address to be used by P2P for the cash register.
This allows to not use broadcast messages for the registration.
For the IPV6 the max length allowed is a string like[2001:1db8:85a3:18d3:1319:8a2e:1370:7348]:10000

BillShopDataMandatory.description: When true shop fiscal informations are mandatory for bill printing (NF 525. Only for FR).

BillRcptRestartNum.description:
NF525 Restart number for bill-receipt counters.
This is the value from which the counters start at every bookeeping date's change

QRCodeConnectionString.description: This field contains connection string used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeComputerName.description: This field computer name string used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeIpAddress.description: This field ip address used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeSubnetMask.description: This field subnet mask used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeDefaultGateway.description: This field default gateway used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeDnsServer.description: This field is the preferred DNS server used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeAlternateDnsServer.description: This field is the alternate DNS server used for the QR code setup generation

LastQRCode.description: This field last qrcode QR code setup generated

QRCodeApplyNetworkParam.description: When true, QR code setup generated apply the network parameters

IsOrderTakingOnly.description: If true (1) till can't close transactions and manage shifts

DontPrintEmptyTransactions.description: When 1, transactions without articles or whose articles are all voided, is closed without printing.

AutoSwap.description: When 1, the alternative articles or menus are shown automatically in a popup

DeviceHealthCheckEnabled.description: Flag that enable the device status checker on the till.

CloseButtonOnFastLoginForm.description: When true, a close button is added into the FastLogin form of FrontEnd.

TipPercentageAlert.description: It is shown a warning message box if the Operator enters a tip over the specified percent of the original bill

PayAtTableCashPaymentId.description: The cash payment used by the PayAtTable module

PayAtTableCreditPayment.description: The credit card payment used by the PayAtTable module

CreditCardTipArticleId.description: The article used by the credit card management as tip

PluginSetId.description: TODO: check PluginSet entity Id rules [geotan]

CardloaderPaymentId.description: The cash payment item to use when performing a card loader process

Translations.description: List of all Translations available for this entity.

ProductionCenterOverrides.description: List of production center overrides for this till

MonitorProductionCenters.description: Abilitations of production center per monitors (meaningful only if this till is a monitor)

Halls.description: List of halls used by this till

PrinterBitmaps.description: List of printer bitmaps associated to the till.

PayPrinterOverrides.description: List of till pay printer overrides.

ExtraSharedPrinters.description: List of additional shared printers assigned to be assigned to a till.

SharedPrinterOverrides.description: List of redirectional shared printers used by the production centers.

MonitorMessages.description: List of monitor messages defined for the till.

TillType.description: Till type. Supported codes are TCPOS.Domain.Tills.Enums.TillTypes

ShopId.description: The id of the shop the till belongs to

Enabled.description: When true, this till can be used.

BillHeader.description: The lines printed at the top of the bill.

BillFooter.description: The lines printed at the bottom of the bill.

DisplayCustomerClosed1.description: The message shown to the customer when the operator is logged out, first line.

DisplayCustomerClosed2.description: The message shown to the customer when the operator is logged out, second line.

DisplayCustomerSale1.description: The message shown to the customer after login, cancel and transaction total, first line.

DisplayCustomerSale2.description:
The message shown to the customer after login, cancel and transaction total, second line.
If after a total, this line is shown only after TotalTimeout seconds.

DisplayOperatorSale1.description: The message shown to the user after login, cancel and transaction total, first line.

DisplayOperatorSale2.description:
The message shown to the user after login, cancel and transaction total, second line.
If after a total, this line is shown only after TotalTimeout seconds

InactivityTimeout.description: Number of seconds of between database connection retries.

LogoutTimeout.description: Number of seconds of inactivity before an operator logout is forced

PauseTimeout.description: Number of seconds of inactivity before an operator pause is forced

TotalTimeout.description: Number of seconds before the Total message is hidden after a transaction is closed

MonitorWarnTimeout.description:
Field used by monitor tills: Timeout after which the article has to be displayed in
a different color

MaxLineAmount.description: The maximum allowed amount of a manually entered article price.

FastLogout.description: When true, a operator logout is automatically made after every transaction close or suspension.

NoDrawer.description:
Do not check the drawer status at the end of the transaction.
Just show a dialog box showing the change amount

SuspendOperator.description: When true, it is possible to suspend the current transaction on an operator.

DumpTransaction.description: When true, the transaction in progress is continuously stored in file in case of till crash.

DumpClosing.description: When true, the closing in progress is continuously stored in file in case of till crash.

ShowTablesForm.description: If true, the tables form has to be show each time

ForceTableUsage.description: If true, the tables selection is mandatory to close the transaction

ForceTableUsage.description: If true, the tables selection is mandatory to close the transaction

AskGuestsNumber.description: The number of guest is asked to the user. 0 = Never, 1 = Always, 2 = On table selection

DefaultGuestsNumber.description: The default guest number for the transaction

DefaultLayer.description:
The default layer of this till.
If -1, the layer is linked to the day of week

DefaultLayerReturn.description:
When the till should show again the default layer:
0 - Never, only on startup
1 - After each login
2 - After each transaction

AmountValue1.description: Amount input keypad, first fixed amount button starting from bottom.

AmountValue2.description: Amount input keypad, second fixed amount button starting from bottom.

AmountValue3.description: Amount input keypad, third fixed amount button starting from bottom.

AmountValue4.description: Amount input keypad, fourth fixed amount button starting from bottom.

PrepayValue1.description:
Amount input keypad, first fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

PrepayValue2.description:
Amount input keypad, second fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

PrepayValue3.description:
Amount input keypad, third fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

PrepayValue4.description:
Amount input keypad, third fixed amount button starting from bottom
when a prepayment is requested.

LocalDbArticles.description: When true, the article an price lookup is made locally even if online

LocalDbTransactions.description:
When true, transactions are not sent immediately to the server but stored locally
and sent asynchronously.

LocalDbCards.description: When true, the customer search is made locally even if online.

MaxDatabaseAge.description:
The age (espressed in minutes) a local DB can be in order to be considered "refreshed"
At till startup, if the age of the local DB is lower than the specified number of minutes, no snapshot download is performed.
When looking for a DB over the P2P, the DB is accepted if its age is lower than the specified number of minutes.

TillTemplateId.description:
Till keyboard template. When it is not null, the keys will be retrieved from
the template keys instead directly from the till keys table

JournalTemplateId.description: The template used for electronic journals

JobTemplateId.description: The template to print generic string lists

FiscalTemplateId.description: The template used for fiscal bills

InvoiceTemplateId.description: The template used for invoices printed with the slip printer

ReceiptTemplateId.description: The template used for receipts printed with the slip printer

MonitorTemplateId.description: Field used by monitor tills: Template to be used when printing preparation bills

PayAtTablePreprintTemplateId.description: The pre-print template used by the PayAtTable module

PayAtTableBillTemplateId.description: The receipt template used by the PayAtTable module

CardloaderClosingTemplateId.description: The receipt template used by the PayAtTable module

DefaultPricelevelId.description: The Id of the default pricelevel used in this till.

ProductionCenterCounterId.description: The production center order counter id

PrintoutMandatory.description: When true, a printer must be selected

PrintJoined.description: When 1 the articles with same code and properties are joined together when printed

ShowCourseOrder.description: When true, the course order is shown on the article list beside each line

CourseDisplayModeActive.description: When true, the course display mode is enabled

ShowArticlesNumber.description: When true, the number of articles is shown on the article list

ForcePricelevel.description:
When true, the till will always sell the articles with the default pricelevel
and the forced articles will not change pricelevel even if the function is used.
The transaction pricelevel is not modified.

SaveItemPricelevel.description:
When true, changing the pricelevel will not change the pricelevel of the items
already entered into the transaction

TextParameters.description:
This field contains parameters that have the same syntax of the INI file.
It is parsed in the same way as the INI file after data is loaded.

CardloaderWithdrawalId.description: The withdrawal item to use when a withdrawal operation is performed on the card loader

EftPresent.description: True when a EFT display is present

TicketManagerPresent.description: True when a ticket manager device is present

FingerprintPresent.description: True when a fingerprinter device is present

MonitorHideEmpty.description: Field used by monitor tills: Hide the bills with no article to be prepared

MonitorShowOnHold.description: Field used by monitor tills: Show the articles not yet called

MonitorDivideArticles.description:
Field used by monitor tills: When true, in article visualisation mode, the
articles with different modifiers(comments, additions) are separated

MonitorShowCourses.description: Field used by monitor tills: Show current courses

VendingVatId.description: The id of the VAT to be used for vending machines tills

MacAddress.description:
The mac address of the physical cash register connected to this record.
It is used by the cash register setup procedure

MultipleItemQuantityMode.description:
When true, selling an article with quantity bigger than 1
will in fact sell multiple items instead of change the quantity of the item

InvFiscDataMandatory.description: When true customer fiscal informations are mandatory for invoice printing (Only for IT).

ShowSeatNumbers.description: Enable or disable showing the seat number on transaction items

FiscalRegisterId.description: This field contains the fiscal register id defined by the fiscal authorities

P2PIpAddress.description:
The (optional) static IP address to be used by P2P for the cash register.
This allows to not use broadcast messages for the registration.
For the IPV6 the max length allowed is a string like[2001:1db8:85a3:18d3:1319:8a2e:1370:7348]:10000

BillShopDataMandatory.description: When true shop fiscal informations are mandatory for bill printing (NF 525. Only for FR).

BillRcptRestartNum.description:
NF525 Restart number for bill-receipt counters.
This is the value from which the counters start at every bookeeping date's change

QRCodeConnectionString.description: This field contains connection string used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeComputerName.description: This field computer name string used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeIpAddress.description: This field ip address used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeSubnetMask.description: This field subnet mask used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeDefaultGateway.description: This field default gateway used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeDnsServer.description: This field is the preferred DNS server used for the QR code setup generation

QRCodeAlternateDnsServer.description: This field is the alternate DNS server used for the QR code setup generation

LastQRCode.description: This field last qrcode QR code setup generated

QRCodeApplyNetworkParam.description: When true, QR code setup generated apply the network parameters

IsOrderTakingOnly.description: If true (1) till can't close transactions and manage shifts

DontPrintEmptyTransactions.description: When 1, transactions without articles or whose articles are all voided, is closed without printing.

AutoSwap.description: When 1, the alternative articles or menus are shown automatically in a popup

DeviceHealthCheckEnabled.description: Flag that enable the device status checker on the till.

CloseButtonOnFastLoginForm.description: When true, a close button is added into the FastLogin form of FrontEnd.

TipPercentageAlert.description: It is shown a warning message box if the Operator enters a tip over the specified percent of the original bill

PayAtTableCashPaymentId.description: The cash payment used by the PayAtTable module

PayAtTableCreditPayment.description: The credit card payment used by the PayAtTable module

CreditCardTipArticleId.description: The article used by the credit card management as tip

PluginSetId.description: TODO: check PluginSet entity Id rules [geotan]

CardloaderPaymentId.description: The cash payment item to use when performing a card loader process

KumoAPI.Vouchers.Voucher.description: Represents a voucher that can be used as a payment.

Id.description: This field is the primary key exposed and it represents the TCPOS code.

Description.description:
The description of the voucher.
Can be translated via Translation entries.

VisibilityCriteriaId.description: The id of the visibility of the voucher.

IsValid.description: If true, the voucher is valid and can be used.

PaymentId.description: The id of the payment used with the voucher.

RefundGiven.description: If true, a cash refund can be given in case this voucher is not fully spent.

VoucherValue.description: Voucher value. If null, the value has to be requested to the user.

InvoiceCompanyId.description: The issuing company used in re-invoicing phase for the collection of their counter value.

DiscountId.description: The discount used with this voucher.

PrepayRevaluationId.description:
The specific prepay revaluation.
If present overwrite the shop voucher revaluation.

RevaluationId.description:
The specific revaluation.
If present, adds a revaluation discount to the transaction

UseInPrepayment.description: If true, the voucher can be used to recharge a prepaid customer card. (or mixed)

AbcGroupId.description: The abc group that is assigned to the voucher.

PayNonFoodArticles.description: When true, the voucher can be used to pay non-food articles

TillId.description: Id of the corresponding till.

ShopId.description: Id of the corresponding shop.

WithdrawalId.description: Id of the corresponding withdrawal / deposit.

WithdrawalDescription.description: Description of the corresponding withdrawal / deposit.

DeleteOperatorId.description: Id of the corresponding delete operator.

DeleteOperatorDescription.description: Description of the corresponding delete operator.

Exported.description: When true the withdrawal transaction has been exported.

Currency.description: The currency of the withdrawal. It is only set if Multi Country is enabled.

CurrencyRatio.description:
The ratio of the withdrawal currency versus the base currency.
It is only set if Multi Country is enabled.

Items.description: Corresponding withdrawal transaction items.

DenominationItems.description: Denomination items of corresponding withdrawal transaction.

Id.description: Primary key

PaymentId.description:
ID of the corresponding payment. Only payments of the following types are allowed:
Cash
Voucher
Credit card
Cheque
Debitor

CurrencyId.description:
ID of the linked currency.
For cash payments this way a foreign currency can be specified.
For other payment types a currency must not be set.

VoucherId.description:
ID of the linked voucher.
For voucher payments the corresponding voucher must be specified.
For other payment types a voucher must not be set.
The specified voucher must be linked to the corresponding payment as well.

InsertDetails.description:
If disabled, FrontEnd asks the operator to insert the global amount of the withdrawal,
otherwise, it asks to detail it according to the lettering of the used coins.
Details can only be enabled for cash payments.
